topics.body:
"@Zak_Inc":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/55a68f0a6368722429000783#post_55a68f0a6368722429000783
And lets not forget the Awesome opening leading up to everything and everyone getting fucked in Half Life 1.

I loved how they brought off the feeling of "An Everyday Job routine". You get up, you go to work, say hello to the people you work with on a daily basis.

you didn't know shit was going to go to hell today but it did.

Plus I like how in the opening they have kind of subtle hints of shits going to get bad, with peoples computers not working right, machinery malfunctioning.

To the actual Character He's probably thinking "Well this day is going to suck". but oh wow you have no idea gordan, You have nooo idea.
topics.author: 50c204917f123b31440000a5
